page.title: 01GENERAL FEATURES
page.content: A low_lying area at sea level extensively drained to allow {farming} The farms are mostly {grassland} with{ {farm animals }such as cattle and sheep It includes part of the village of Pilning,{Pilning Station, primary} {school}and village hall. Railway lines run through the area connecting the S.W. to the Severn Tunnel. At the S.E. end of the area the land rises to a limestone {promontory }Knole Park, part of the village of {Almondsbury, where a number of detached{houses}are built in large gardens. At the foot of the hill lies on one side, Ibstock Cattybrook{Brick Works}and on the other a few modern houses, part of Lower Almondsbury. The area is crossed by{footpaths, rhines}and a line of pylons. There are a number of rather narrow metalled{roads.
